EmailTemplate.subject: Your complementary report from Nokia has arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you!
Here’s a link to your requested white paper: Any Vision. Implications for TV Operators.
You can download this paper from here at any time. We hope you find this paper inspiring and something you will want to discuss with us.
